title: Group portrait of fourteen women, seated, from left: Susie Johnson, Mrs. Lewis McIntyre, Mrs. William C. Bannew, and Josephine Page; standing, from left: Mabel Stewart, Mary Coe, Elizabeth Alexander, Catherine Roberts, Grace Booker, director of the home, presenting gift to Dolly Johnson, Annie Arvin, Mrs. Harry Peterson,  Mrs. McKinstrey, and Mrs. C.A. Taylor, gathered in Lemington Home for Dolly Johnson's birthday and donation of dinette tables
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
